alert.note: Alert for Attala; Holmes (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 7:12PM CST until February 26 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Black River At West affecting Attala and Holmes Counties. For the Big Black/Homochitto...including West, Bentonia, Bovina, Rosetta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Black River At West. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15 feet, Lowlands and agricultural land near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 15.2 feet and slowly falling. - Forecast...The river is expected begin rising again tonight, and crest near 16 feet during the morning Friday. - Flood stage is 15 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Big Black River West 15.0 15.2 Thu 6 pm CST 15.8 14.3 12.9 &&
info.instruction: Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning.
